title: RP buying problem
body:
I buyed 215 RP before i uninstalled the game,after that i installed it 1 month later and now when i try to buy more RP it says i dont have enough money,its via credit and i got 396 RSD and i need 300 RSD

I heard u need some confirmation message.

Could use some help thanks!

replies.body: Hey, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our billing team can look into this for you.  They'll be able to assist directly and offer more context and options.  See you there!
